user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on our current project status. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah@company.com"],"subject":"Project Status Update","body":"Hi Sarah,

Here’s a quick update on the project:
• We’re on track with all current milestones.
• The new algorithm has been integrated into the trading platform and is now in final testing; no significant issues have surfaced.
• Our next focus is on preparing documentation and training materials for the upcoming client workshop.

Let me know if you have any questions or need additional details.

Best,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Your project status update has been emailed to Sarah. Let me know if there’s anything else you need!

final_output: Your project status update has been emailed to Sarah. Let me know if there’s anything else you need!
